alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:01AM CDT until April 05 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Northern Stephenson County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 501 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stockton, or 19 miles south of Darlington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nora and Kent around 505 AM CDT. Lena, Lake Le-Aqua-na State Park and Waddams Grove around 510 AM CDT. Winslow, Mc Connell and Damascus around 515 AM CDT. Buena Vista, Oneco, Orangeville and Red Oak around 520 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Afolkey, Rock Grove and Lake Summerset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
